attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Make the Directors of the Learning and Skills Council more accountable and personally liable for losses or mismanagement of their £10bn budget.
(LSC now take legal action against Directors of Voluntary Organisations when they cannot recover funds from the organisation).This now unfair and makes it too risky for small orgs to contract with the LSC.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
